title: HNClient is a super easy to use client for Hacker News API written in Swift 3
author: omaralbeik
content: readme.md hnclientsuper easy use client hacker news apiusage hacker news items, user profiles, much more few lines codeitemsfetch story, comment, job, ask hn, poll poll part a given id:hnmanager.shared.fetchitem(id: 9127232) { item, error // returns optional hnitem object}usersfetch user profile public activity a given id:hnmanager.shared.fetchuser(id: "jl") { user, error //
